text: Huang Lizhu (born 9 October 1987 in Qionghai) is a Chinese competitive sailor. She competed at the 2016 Summer Olympics in Rio de Janeiro, in the women's 470 class. ==References== == External links == * * * * Category:1987 births Category:Living people Category:Chinese female sailors (sport) Category:Olympic sailors of China Category:Sailors at the 2016 Summer Olympics – 470 Category:Sailors at the 2014 Asian Games Category:Asian Games competitors for China
title: Huang Lizhu
